description: Fingerprint and probe gRPC-Web endpoints to understand their structure and test for misconfigurations.
instructions:
1. In the Network tab, look for requests with a content-type of `application/grpc-web`.
2. Note the endpoint URL. gRPC-Web is not human-readable directly in the browser.
3. Use a specialized browser extension (like gRPC-Web Developer Tools) to decode the binary messages.
4. Attempt to identify the services and methods being called. This reconnaissance is the first step to more advanced gRPC attacks.
